title: It’s crafty, fish-stealing sharks vs. anglers in NatGeo’s Bull Shark Bandits
description: Depredation behavior offers evidence that bull sharks are more intelligent than we thought.

title: Bizarre ancient sea creature brings evolution mystery to the surface
description: A new tunicate fossil, a close relative of vertebrates, is half a billion years old.

title: The heat wave scorching the US is a self-perpetuating monster
description: Record highs in the US are due to a heat dome—and it’s expected to worsen.
